title: Were-Dinosaurs: Chasm of Extinction
description: In the final showdown of the Were-Dinosaurs series, Alex, Julia, Roy, and Tilly confront their most formidable adversaries to prevent the world from spiraling into oblivion.With the fate of humanity hanging in the balance, the gang is going to need a little help from their friends – and perhaps even a few enemies – to stand a chance of emerging victorious.Sometimes you have to conquer the past to ensure any kind of future.
author: S. B. Clark
